DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3 TNM Finding Digital Rectal Examination Assessment Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text statement to describe the extent of the clinical spread of prostate cancer (cT3) in which the Digital Rectal Exam (DRE) was suspicious for local extraprostatic extension (extension through the prostate capsule).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3 TNM Finding Digital Rectal Examination Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer extending through the prostatic capsule.  Invasion into the prostatic apex or into (but not beyond) the prostatic capsule is classified not as T3 but as T2. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)_An examination that checks for abnormalities of organs or other structures in the pelvis and lower abdomen. During a digital rectal exam, a health professional inserts a lubricated, gloved finger of one hand into the rectum and may use the other hand to press on the lower abdomen or pelvic area._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3 TNM Finding v7
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer extending through the prostatic capsule.  Invasion into the prostatic apex or into (but not beyond) the prostatic capsule is classified not as T3 but as T2. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3 TNM Finding Edition 7 Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer extending through the prostatic capsule.  Invasion into the prostatic apex or into (but not beyond) the prostatic capsule is classified not as T3 but as T2. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)_The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prostate Cancer cT3b TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3b TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer invading seminal vesicle(s). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer cT3b TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer invading seminal vesicle(s). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.value: Unilateral or Bilateral Local Extracapsular Extension Suspected (cT3a)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prostate Cancer cT3a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prostate Cancer cT3a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extracapsular extension (unilateral or bilateral). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer cT3a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with extracapsular extension (unilateral or bilateral). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)
